title: Traditional bread and butter pudding
ingredients: ['8 slices white bread', '50g (2 oz) lightly salted butter', '50g (2 oz) currants or sultanas', '300ml (1/2 pt) milk', '120ml (4 fl oz) whipping cream', '50g (2 oz) caster sugar', 'zest of 1/2 a lemon', '3 eggs', 'freshly grated nutmeg (optional)', '50g (2 oz) candied lemon or orange peel (optional)']
